greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of divisors d of n such that A276086(d) divides n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..30030
Index entries for sequences related to primorial base
formula: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} [A276086(d)|n], where [ ] is the Iverson bracket.
program: A276086(n) = { my(i=0,m=1,pr=1,nextpr); while((n>0),i=i+1; nextpr = prime(i)*pr; if((n%nextpr),m*=(prime(i)^((n%nextpr)/pr));n-=(n%nextpr));pr=nextpr); m; };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 07 2019
